Title: For Richer or Poorer
Actors: Tim Allen, Kirstie Alley, Jay O. Sanders, Michael Lerner
Plot: The incredibly rich, but miserable New York couple, Brad and Caroline Sexton, got framed by their accountant, and fled from the IRS to the one place where no one would look for them: Amish country. Now they've got to do their best to blend in, and learn how to love all over again.
Production: Sheinberg Productions, Universal Pictures, The Bubble Factory, Yorktown Productions
